Product Title: Llama Llama Red Pajama
Review Date: 2020/04/19
Store: Jennifer Garner  (Actor),     Shayle Simons  (Actor),     Saul Blinkoff  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD
Product Description: ["Adventure and learning await in these heart-warming tales based on the award-winning book series by author and illustrator Anna Dewdney. Join Llama Llama, Nelly Gnu, Luna Giraffe, Euclid the Sheep and Gilroy Goat as they explore their safe, friendly hometown and make childhood memories. On this DVD, watch Llama Llama at his first sleepover with friends! Learn how to share on a play date with Nelly Gnu! Discover what makes Llama Llama's red pajamas so lucky and so much more!  Learn and play with Llama Llama and pals!"]
Average Rating: 4.6

Thomas & Friends: Blue Mountain Mystery the Movie
Michael Brandon  (Actor),     David Bedella  (Actor),     Greg Tiernan  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
['Product Description', "When trouble strikes at the Blue Mountain Quarry, Thomas is sent to help his Narrow Gauge engine friends. While shunting and hauling, he discovers a little green engine hiding in the tunnels. Thomas is determined to get to the bottom of the mystery but discovering the truth is harder than he imagined! Will Thomas be able to help his new friend? Or will the little engine be sent away from Sodor forever? Find out in Thomas' most mysterious adventure yet, a movie the whole family will love!", 'Bonus Content:', 'Blue Mountain Hide & Peep Game', 'Blue Mountain Hide & Peep Game', 'Learn About Standard & Narrow Guage Engines', 'Learn About Standard & Narrow Guage Engines', '"Blue Mountain Mystery" Karaoke Music Video', '"Blue Mountain Mystery" Karaoke Music Video', '"Working Together!" Karaoke Music Video', '"Working Together!" Karaoke Music Video', ']]>', 'Amazon.com', 'Thomas the tank engine and his railway friends learn all about how rumors spread and the importance of getting all the facts before leaping to judgment in', 'Blue Mountain Mystery', '. When Sir Topham Hatt sends Thomas off to help the narrow-gauge engines at Blue Mountain Quarry after Paxton is injured by an unstable bridge, Thomas discovers a little green engine hiding in the tunnels. Some sleuthing reveals that green engine Luke is hiding because he once did something very bad; but what that something is remains a mystery. Thomas decides to find out exactly what happened, but his detective work yields some unintended consequences that just might get Luke thrown off of Sodor Island. This', 'Thomas & Friends', 'movie acquaints young viewers with the concept of standard and narrow-gauge tracks and engines and introduces new friends Owen the traction engine, who pulls heavy loads up the quarry incline; little green engine Luke; Merrick the sleepy crane; and track car Winston, who makes odd sounds and has a long way to go before becoming a really useful member of the railway. (Ages 2 to 6)', '--Tami Horiuchi']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** Enthusiastic about family-friendly animated content with nostalgic themes, particularly classic characters and franchises that resonate with children. 
- **Target Audience:** Strong preference for media aimed at young audiences, prioritizing experiences that promote family bonding through engaging and wholesome entertainment activities with grandchildren.
- **Purchasing Behavior:** Actively seeks deals on high-quality media, favoring well-reviewed products to ensure enjoyable experiences during family gatherings. The recent purchase highlights a commitment to selecting captivating animated films, with a focus on educational and heartwarming narratives that can enrich family interactions.
- **Content Preference:** Chooses films and shows appealing to both children and adults, emphasizing quality content that cultivates joy during shared viewing moments. Enthusiastic about media that generates cherished memories and fosters togetherness, reflected in positive ratings and reviews.
- **Format Preference:** Open to various formats that enhance viewing experiences, particularly appreciating high-quality audio-visual components and special features that add value to family movie nights.
- **Engagement Style:** Expresses delight through enthusiastic ratings and reviews, showcasing eagerness for media that fosters joyful connections with loved ones.

This user continues to prioritize enriching family experiences through high-quality animated content while remaining mindful of value-driven purchasing decisions, reflecting a deep commitment to facilitating joyful interactions during shared entertainment moments.
